details.title: It's a nice phone but Flipkart is Flipkart...
details.description: Audio quality is very bad...Phone ringing sound is also hopeless.Samsung should improve on this area. Rest of the specs are ok . Flipkart also should consider these feedback's and can let the vendors know (not sure if they have this mechanism)
details.name: Ramesh G V

details.title: nice product
details.description: BULL SHIT PHONE LOTES OF SOFTWARE ISSUES OR OTHER UNKNOWN SCREEN SHOW UN USUAL COLOUR WHEN CALLING AND DIDNT WORK
